howItWorks.title: How AI Helps You Work
howItWorks.description: XOPC enables one person to do the work of an entire team through intelligent task scheduling, automated workflow orchestration, and human-machine collaboration.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Describe your needs in everyday language, AI understands and breaks down tasks
howItWorks.step2Desc: AI automatically generates task lists, assigns priorities and dependencies
howItWorks.step3Desc: AI handles tasks in parallel, automatically generating code, designs, and documents
howItWorks.step4Desc: Human in the loop at key points to ensure quality and direction

useCases.title: Use Cases
useCases.subtitle: Whatever your role, XOPC boosts your productivity
useCases.devDesc: From requirements analysis to code implementation, AI assists throughout. A one-person dev team can iterate quickly.
useCases.designDesc: Describe your ideas in text, AI generates designs, illustrations, and assets, saving repetitive work.
useCases.contentDesc: From topic selection to final article, AI helps create higher quality content for consistent output.
useCases.pmDesc: Quickly produce PRDs, prototypes, and documentation, spending time on what truly matters.
useCases.entrepreneurDesc: One person is a team. Validate ideas from 0 to 1 quickly, reducing trial and error costs.
useCases.freelancerDesc: Serve multiple clients simultaneously, AI helps you efficiently manage projects and delivery quality.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: XOPC is for any creator looking to boost personal productivity. Whether you're an independent developer, designer, content creator, product manager, or entrepreneur, as long as you need AI assistance with your work, XOPC can help you do it more efficiently.
faq.q2: How is AI-generated content quality guaranteed?
faq.a2: XOPC uses Human in Loop mechanism, requiring human confirmation at key points before proceeding to the next stage. It also supports multiple iterations and manual editing to ensure the final output meets your expectations and quality requirements.
faq.q3: Do I need programming knowledge to use XOPC?
faq.a3: No, you don't. You only need to describe your needs in natural language, and AI will understand and execute. XOPC is designed for everyone to easily use AI, no technical background required.
faq.q4: Will my data be stored and shared?
faq.a4: Your data security is XOPC's top priority. All data is stored locally by default and will not be shared with third parties without authorization. Please refer to our privacy policy for details.
faq.q5: What stage is XOPC currently in?
faq.a5: XOPC is currently in Alpha stage, actively developing and iterating. Welcome to join the waitlist to become an early access user and help us build the AI-era personal productivity operating system together.
faq.q6: How do I join the waitlist?
faq.a6: Just fill in the email form at the bottom of the page and submit. We will regularly invite new users to join Alpha testing and notify you of the latest developments first.

demo.title: Task Pipeline Interaction Demo
demo.subtitle: Drag task cards to experience the 4-stage workflow
demo.aiSuggestion: Tip: Drag cards between stages to experience intelligent task management. Plan stage requires Human in Loop confirmation.
demo.aiSuggestionTodo: Task moved to Todo, ready to start planning.
demo.aiSuggestionPlan: Task entered Plan stage, waiting for Human in Loop confirmation.
demo.aiSuggestionDoing: Task started execution, AI is processing...
demo.aiSuggestionDone: Task completed! AI is summarizing insights.

taskModal.aiWelcome: Hello! Im XOPC AI Assistant. Regarding this task, I can help you with:
taskModal.aiDisclaimer: AI can make mistakes. Please verify important information.
aiResponses: Great question! Let me analyze it for you...
Based on the task description, I suggest implementing it in these steps:
You can refer to industry best practices like Trello or Notion.
Let me generate an initial implementation plan for you.
taskModal.wantMore: Would you like me to elaborate on any part? Or tell me your specific needs.
